entry.title: DCEtool: Efficient and Accessible Discrete Choice Experiments

link.title: DCEtool: Efficient and Accessible Discrete Choice Experiments

entry.summary: What is DCEtool and how to install it DCEtool is a R package to design, respond and analyze DCEs. DCEtool has been coded in R using the visual interface provided by the shiny package. DCEtool is available in the CRAN repository and can be easily installed typing the following code in R or RStudio. install.packages('DCEtool') library(DCEtool) Before running the previous code, shiny must be inst...
